tool.name: SAGA.statistics_regression.2
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayPOINTS False isArrayATTRIBUTE False isArrayTARGET_TEMPLATE False output_data_RESIDUALS $output_data_RESIDUALS output_data_TARGET_OUT_GRID $output_data_TARGET_OUT_GRID name SAGA.statistics_regression.2 POINTS $POINTS ATTRIBUTE $ATTRIBUTE POLYNOM $POLYNOM XORDER $XORDER YORDER $YORDER TORDER $TORDER TARGET_DEFINITION $TARGET_DEFINITION TARGET_USER_SIZE $TARGET_USER_SIZE TARGET_USER_XMIN $TARGET_USER_XMIN TARGET_USER_XMAX $TARGET_USER_XMAX TARGET_USER_YMIN $TARGET_USER_YMIN TARGET_USER_YMAX $TARGET_USER_YMAX TARGET_USER_COLS $TARGET_USER_COLS TARGET_USER_ROWS $TARGET_USER_ROWS TARGET_USER_FITS $TARGET_USER_FITS TARGET_TEMPLATE $TARGET_TEMPLATE prefer $prefer response $response outputType_RESIDUALS $OutputSection_RESIDUALS.outputType_RESIDUALS transmissionMode_RESIDUALS $OutputSection_RESIDUALS.transmissionMode_RESIDUALS outputType_TARGET_OUT_GRID $OutputSection_TARGET_OUT_GRID.outputType_TARGET_OUT_GRID transmissionMode_TARGET_OUT_GRID $OutputSection_TARGET_OUT_GRID.transmissionMode_TARGET_OUT_GRID

param.name: POINTS
param.label: Points
param.help: Points The following data types are allowed in the txt file: xml, vnd.google-earth.kml+xml, json

param.name: ATTRIBUTE
param.label: Attribute
param.help: Attribute The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: TARGET_USER_COLS
param.label: Columns
param.help: Number of cells in East-West direction.

param.name: TARGET_USER_ROWS
param.label: Rows
param.help: Number of cells in North-South direction.

param.name: TARGET_TEMPLATE
param.label: Target System
param.help: use this grid's system for output grids The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-envi, x-ogc-aaigrid, png, tiff

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_RESIDUALS
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_RESIDUALS
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_TARGET_OUT_GRID
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_TARGET_OUT_GRID
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: Reference:<br/> - Lloyd, C. (2010): Spatial Data Analysis - An Introduction for GIS Users. Oxford, 206p.<br/>
